$!The Court of Protection makes decisions and appoints deputies to act on behalf of people who are unable to make decisions about their personal health, finance or welfare.$!

$C
**The Court of Protection**  

**Telephone:** 0300 456 4600   
 Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm  
**Out of hours telephone:** 020 7947 6000 
$C


You can also write to the following address:

$A
The Royal Courts of Justice
Thomas More Building
Strand
London
WC2A 2LL
$A

Read information on [what the Court of Protection does and how to make an application.](/apply-to-the-court-of-protection "apply to the court of protection")
